DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_Resources_t Struct Reference
cfarcaProc DPU External » cfarcaProc DPU External Data Structures

CFAR Hardware resources. More...

#include <dpu/cfarcaproc/cfarcaprochwa.h>

Data Fields

EDMA_Handle edmaHandle
 EDMA Handle.
 
DPEDMA_ChanCfg edmaHwaIn
 EDMA configuration for CFAR data In.
 
DPEDMA_ChanCfg edmaHwaInSignature
 EDMA configuration for EDMA In to trigger HWA.
 
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_HwaCfarConfig hwaCfg
 HWA Configuration.
 
DPIF_DetMatrix detMatrix
 Pointer to range/Doppler log2 magnitude detection matrix. The data buffer must be aligned to DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_DET_MATRIX_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
DPIF_CFARDetList * cfarRngDopSnrList
 Pointer to CFAR output list, must be aligned to DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_CFAR_DET_LIST_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t cfarRngDopSnrListSize
 Number of elements of type DPIF_cfarDetList of CFAR output list.
 
uint16_t * hwaMemInp
 HWA scratch memory to page-in detection matrix. Note two contiguous M memory banks (of the 4 banks) could be allocated to this.
 
uint32_t hwaMemInpSize
 Number of elements of type uint16_t of HWA memory to hold detection matrix (associated with hwaMemInp)
 
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput * hwaMemOutDoppler
 HWA scratch memory for producing intermediate cfar detection list in Doppler domain, cannot be overlaid with other HWA scratch memory inputs specified in this structure. Must be different memory bank than bank(s) of hwaMemInpSize. Must be aligned to DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_HWA_MEM_OUT_DOPPLER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT. Note this need not be the start of a HWA memory bank but typically it is, and is therefore naturally aligned to this alignment requirement.
 
uint32_t hwaMemOutDopplerSize
 Number of elements of type DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput of HWA memory for cfar detection list in Doppler domain.
 
DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput * hwaMemOutRange
 HWA scratch memory for producing intermediate cfar detection list in Range domain, cannot be overlaid with other HWA scratch memory inputs for this DPU. Must be different memory bank than bank(s) of hwaMemInp. Must be aligned to DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_HWA_MEM_OUT_RANGE_BYTE_ALIGNMENT. Note this need not be the start of a HWA memory bank but typically it is, and is therefore naturally aligned to this alignment requirement.
 
uint32_t hwaMemOutRangeSize
 Number of elements of type DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput of HWA memory for cfar detection list in Range domain.
 
uint32_t * cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask
 Scratch memory for Doppler cfar detection bit mask. Must be aligned to DPU_CFARCAPROCHWA_DOPPLER_DET_OUT_BIT_MASK_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t cfarDopplerDetOutBitMaskSize
 Number of elements of type uint32_t of scratch memory for bit mask of Doppler cfar detections. Must be >= (numRangeBins * numDoppplerBins) / 32.
 

Detailed Description

CFAR Hardware resources.
